attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to sort out all the empty properties and to stop people having to sleep on the streets its 2008 people should not have to sleep in car parks most homeless people are white there is never any bme groups homeless we should look after our own first my grandad fought for this country and if he knew his granddaughter was sleeping on the streets 3 years ago he would be turning in his grave,sort all abandoned properties out and help our own first

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
